item.description: Join us for Interactive Game Show Style Trivia at the Rosebud every Wednesday Night at 8pm. This is fun fast paced interactive style trivia, similar to Jeopardy, where you BUZZ in your answer to questions asked via video display and by Game Show host. 4 play 4 rounds of thought provoking questions, 2 rounds multiple choice and 2 rounds fastest response. We have a winner each round and and over winner for the night based on highest points total. prizes awarded to each rounds winner and grand prize to overall winner. The overall winner also gets to choose a category for the following week and overall bragging rights. Why chance a paper cut with the other guys, worst you'll get here is a sprained thumb (lol). So come to the Rosebud and get your Buzz on.
item.name: Wednesday Night Interactive Game Show Style Trivia
